mapper.select: SELECT ID id , ORGANIZATION_ID organizationId, TYPE type, NAME name, AGE age, CONTENT content, FEATURE feature, IMG img, CREATE_TIME createTime FROM T_COURSE_INFO WHERE Id = #{id}
SELECT ID id, NAME name, URL url, CREATE_TIME createTime FROM T_COURSE_IMG WHERE COURSE_ID = #{courseId}
SELECT DISTINCT(tci.TYPE) code, tct.VALUE value FROM T_COURSE_INFO tci LEFT JOIN T_COURSE_TYPE tct ON tct.CODE = tci.TYPE WHERE tci.ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId}
